text: Cassiano Mendes da Rocha or simply Cassiano (born 4 December 1975 in Porto Alegre) is a former Brazilian football player. ==Honours== ;Grêmio *Brasileirão champion: 1996 *Campeonato Gaúcho champion: 1995, 1996 ;Nacional *Uruguayan Primera División champion: 2002 ==External links== *Profile by sambafoot ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Sportspeople from Porto Alegre Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Mogi Mirim Esporte Clube players Category:Grêmio Foot-Ball Porto Alegrense players Category:Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras players Category:UD Logroñés players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Spain Category:São Paulo FC players Category:FC Elista players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:FC Aarau players Category:Expatriate footballers in Switzerland Category:Toros Neza footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:Club Nacional de Football players Category:Expatriate footballers in Uruguay Category:Pohang Steelers players Category:Expatriate footballers in South Korea Category:Al Shabab Al Arabi Club Dubai players Category:Expatriate footballers in the United Arab Emirates Category:Botafogo de Futebol e Regatas players Category:F.C.
